meanings.definition: Of or relating to a family of rodents known as Cricetidae.
meanings.sent1: The cricetid rodents are small and furry.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study various cricetid species in the wild.
meanings.sent3: The cricetid family reunion was a squeaky affair.
meanings.sent4: Her room looked like a cricetid paradise with all the tiny tunnels and nests.
meanings.sent5: The cricetid characteristics include sharp teeth and quick movements.

meanings.definition: A member of the family Cricetidae.
meanings.sent1: The cricetid scurried across the field in search of food.
meanings.sent2: I saw a cricetid nibbling on a seed near the bushes.
meanings.sent3: The cricetid explorer set out on a quest for the biggest cheese.
meanings.sent4: She was as quick as a cricetid when it came to finding hidden treasures.
meanings.sent5: The children giggled at the playful antics of the cricetid in the pet store.
